news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Anza Renewables has launched a real-time comparison tool for over 20 AC and DC energy storage systems, enabling developers and IPPs to instantly assess options. The company is also seeking a Senior Data Analyst to enhance its solar and storage procurement processes.

org_similarity_summary.insight_similar_orgs: Anza Renewables, Terabase Energy, Catalyze, Malta, InstaHub, and AgileSwitch operate in the renewable energy sector. Terabase Energy and Catalyze focus on digitalizing and managing solar power plants, while Malta and InstaHub provide energy storage solutions. AgileSwitch addresses the increasing demand for high-efficiency energy applications.

about_short_description.short_description: Anza Renewables facilitates the use of renewable energy by providing its developer, IPP, and EPC clients with a software solution.

product.name: PV Module Platform
product.description: A platform for comparing solar panels based on value, incorporating balance of system costs, production revenue, and risk factors.

product.name: Energy Storage Platform
product.description: A procurement platform for battery energy storage systems (BESS), ranking options by lifecycle cost and offering technical due diligence.

product.name: Anza Risk RatingTM
product.description: A scoring system to assess and compare the risk associated with solar module and BESS manufacturers and products.

product.name: Solar Risk Reducing Process
product.description: Structured risk assessments for solar products to help buyers filter options based on risk tolerance and buying criteria.

product.name: PAN File Analysis
product.description: Evaluation of manufacturer and third-party PAN files for solar modules to ensure accuracy in production modeling.

product.name: Storage Due Diligence
product.description: Technical due diligence process for energy storage products, including factory visits and assessments.
